topic.title: I think you need to make add-ons for browsers.
topic.body: Browser add-on is much easier to use, even a housewife can use zeronet. the easier it is to connect and use the network, the more users there will be.

1564342643_1Ee72Vmn581qKBm6umMgNBT4DEN4z.body:
> [filips](#comment_103_1LFu1BTScmY82HHtg3TY2jAuSrCYNsQWEY): Which features do you think that this addon should have? Self-contained ZeroNet instance or something else? [...]

I think the installation of the add-on should replace the installation of the zoronet application. Open the main page zeronet by clicking on the add-on icon in the browser. You can enhance the displayed domain names in the browser.

> [h3bhkj5gqz4n3pjm](#comment_499_1CKTRBy9N4RvE3FgeZJpQqFYtLHc37yo11): more people, more problem,secure the user first, secure his privacy, then make new people enter.

Zero is not created for use by many users and not for the elect. Therefore, the easier it is to access the network, the more users.

> [h3bhkj5gqz4n3pjm](#comment_500_1CKTRBy9N4RvE3FgeZJpQqFYtLHc37yo11): democracy deserves people, people in general are not too bright to get that.you want to protect people, as you say:protect the user first, then make new people enter.you will secure them, if it's that your purpose.

I think a browser add-on can help increase users, the add-on doesnâ€™t affect the safety and anonymity of users, it simply simplifies the installation of the network connection program.
